comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
No. 1 Sussex Street, which is very pleasing to the eye, was an office block designed by Willliam Wardell.

Wardell was also the architect of St. Patrick's Cathedral, Melbourne.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: It looks like a scene straight out of Dickens! At the junction of Napoleon and Sussex Streets, looking south. The 1890 map shows "Grafton Wharf" and the kink in Sussex Street apparent in this photo. www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1280-s1-sd&rg...

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Reverse view from up the street - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2925973802/
